title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset their password by navigating to Settings > Security > Reset Password. A verification email will be sent to the registered email.

title: Update Email
content: Users can update their email from Profile Settings. The new email must be verified.

title: Delete Account
content: To delete an account, go to Settings > Account > Delete Account. This action is permanent.

title: Subscription Policy
content: We offer Free, Pro, and Enterprise plans. Pro includes analytics and priority support.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are available within 7 days of purchase.

title: Hello
content: Hey! How can I help you?

title: Hi
content: Hello there! What do you need?

title: Bye
content: Goodbye Rohith! Have a nice day!
